overview: Don "Red" Barry is unjustly accused of being a Missouri Outlaw. The real bad guys are a gang of crooks who've been conning the local merchants and farmers out of their hard-earned dollars. Barry decides to use his bad reputation to his advantage by infiltrating the criminal gang.
tagline: OUTCAST! A price on his head...a fugitive from the law..a great Western star in a new and startling role
title: A Missouri Outlaw
